title: Anyway to report offensive club tags/names?
body: Been noticing some club tags that contain racist or homophobic language, how should I report them?

replies.body: Feel free to report the player themselves and in the box let us know that you're reporting the club name/tag, or you could shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with that info and we can take a look!
